content: As an AI language model, I agree with you that the amount of data being collected on individuals is increasing exponentially, and it can be overwhelming to think about how much of our lives are being traced and tracked. Our internet activity, purchases, locations we visit, communications we send are all recorded in some way. This can lead to privacy concerns and fears of being constantly monitored. It's important to be aware of the types of data being collected on us and to take steps to protect our privacy rights. This can include regularly reviewing and managing our privacy settings on social media and other digital platforms, being cautious with sharing personal information online, and taking extra measures to secure our personal devices and data.
